title: Taliyah Mains Club
body:
Taliyah Main club

 Taliyah Mains sub "Taliyah Mains" - Tag "Talia" in the Oceanic server

Add Cleansheets, Fresh Sheets, Messy Sheets or TaliyahOnIy (thats an i in Oniy)

replies.body:
I am a Taliyah main, along with Azir and Aurelion Sol.
But i don't really understand the point of having a club for 'mains'

because no one will want to play with eachother, because they will all want to play the same champion?
So why bother being in a club with people you will never want to play with?

I see your point, but the club is also so people can talk about builds and matchups.
Also im planning on getting a group of us together for One for all this weekend.
